item.title: Dirty Litter Issue, 4th August
item.description:
This area seems to attract a lot of litter, flytipping, and being used as a toilet (judging by the smell), mostly after the weekend. I realise this is the entrance to a company, but the space before the gates seems to be open when maybe it should be shut off with a gate. It looks like there used to be a heavy gate there originally, it might be a good idea to bring that back to stop this area being used as a binge drinking toilet spot.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, High Street, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 4th August
item.description:
We once again have fly tipping outside and rubbish strewn across the entrance to our flat. Our bin area needs to be contained. When will Hackney council take this seriously? It poses a health and safety risk and encourages pests.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Foulden Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
